extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected CODESYS Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the CODESYS Development System or CODESYS Scripting is affected by retrieving the installed version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the CODESYS Development System version < 3.5.17.0 or CODESYS Scripting version < 4.1.0.0?

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System
extracted_playbook.description: Update CODESYS Development System to version 3.5.17.0 or newer using the CODESYS Installer or by visiting the CODESYS update area.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Scripting
extracted_playbook.description: Update CODESYS Scripting to version 4.1.0.0 or newer using the CODESYS Installer or by visiting the CODESYS update area.

cve_id: CODESYS Development System and Scripting Vulnerability
